function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Environmental factors such as rainfall, temperature, and soil types creating conditions for microbe proliferation.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease outbreak due to favorable environmental conditions for microbes.","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling environmental factors through urban planning and infrastructure development.","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems and urban planning software.","People":"Local communities, urban planners, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and government agencies."},{"Description":"Socio-economic, demographic, and cultural factors contributing to the emergence and spread of disease.","Impact":"Influence on disease spread and severity based on socio-economic and cultural factors.","Mitigation":"Improving poverty rates, enhancing medical knowledge, and promoting public health education and awareness.","Technologies":"Health information systems, medical research and development, and public health campaigns.","People":"Healthcare professionals, researchers, and public health organizations.","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare institutions, and non-profit organizations."},{"Description":"Mobility patterns and trade routes facilitating the spread of infectious diseases.","Impact":"Rapid and extensive transmission of diseases along established trade routes and through mobility patterns.","Mitigation":"Regulating travel and trade, implementing disease surveillance at transportation hubs, and promoting vaccination campaigns.","Technologies":"Disease surveillance systems, vaccination tracking software, and transportation monitoring tools.","People":"Travelers, trade workers, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Government agencies, transportation authorities, and public health organizations."}]}
